description:
Your new besty in the backcountry. This directional splitboard has a scooped, rockered nose and narrow swallowtail that floats through powder, with a traditional camber and progressive side cut for quick turns when you get to the trees.

  • ABS sidewalls reduce the swing weight for improved manoeuvrability
  • Triaxial fibreglass offers a good balance of flex and torsional control
  • Bamboo core is light and snappy
  • FSC-certified wood and Entropy resins reduce the environmental impact of manufacturing
  • Rockered nose and swallowtail keep you afloat in soft snow
  • Sintered 7500 base has great wax retention for a fast ride
  • Karakoram clips
name: Coalition Snow Sojourner Splitboard - Women's
